settings.title: Hair By Helly, Best Mobile Hairdresser In London

settings.editor: Founded by professional hairstylist Helly Baker in 2011, we provide a top-notch hair salon experience at our client's home or a preferred location. Save yourself the travel and wait for your salon appointment. We will come to you and take care of all your hairdressing needs. From simple blow-dry to stunning balayage, and keratin treatments, Helly does it all. Schedule your next cut with us and we promise it will be the last time you ever leave home and go to a hair salon.

To ensure the safety of all our clients and staff, we’ll be following all the government guidelines and protocols, and taking extra measures to minimize exposure to risky situations. For more information about our Covid-19 health and safety measures <u>click here.</u>

settings.testimonial_content: “Helly is the only hairdresser I can trust to cut and color my hair. She is very talented and always does a great job. I could not recommend her services any higher. I look forward to my next appointment!”
“I have never received a better haircut and styling. I feel amazing and super confident with my new look. Can’t believe Helly comes to my home. It’s a much better experience than going to a salon.“

“Helly has been my hairdresser for over 5 years. She did my hair styling on my wedding day and since then she's come to my house once a month to do my hair. I love her and wouldn’t book any other hair stylist.”
